alert.note: Alert for Fayette Ridges; Indiana; Jefferson; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 11 at 8:06PM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SATURDAY TO 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest, southwest, and western Pennsylvania. Portions of northern West Virginia. * WHEN...From 1 AM Saturday to 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and create blowing and drifing snow. Near-blizzard conditions are possible on the higher ridges.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Fayette Ridges; Indiana; Jefferson; Westmoreland Ridges
